entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is worried about an upcoming event.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who suggests he go to Madam Pomfrey.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: The nurse at Hogwarts who is mentioned as a place for Harry to go.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is suspected of trying to get past Fluffy.

entities.name: fluffy
entities.description: A three-headed dog that guards the Philosopher's Stone.

relationships.description: Hermione suggests Harry go to Madam Pomfrey.
Ron mentions that Snape nearly got his leg ripped off by Fluffy.
